author: gn4n4
title: Multilingual quality content
description: 关于Cardano的高质量内容需要以多种语言提供。为了避免杂乱无章。同样的内容应该有多个音频流。

f6_assessments.q0: 这个想法本身符合挑战赛的目标，因为它打算创建一个视频平台，只有高质量的内容（由社区选择），展示Cardano如何在现实生活中应用，这些视频将被翻译成不同的语言。作者认为，在面对自己的母语时，知识的吸收会更好，这很有意义，因为这个人不会像理解不同的语言那样，为理解所教的内容而加倍努力。虽然这个想法在理论上是好的，但有一个细节我认为对成功非常有害：事实上，这些视频只有一个样本是免费提供的，如果人们想看到它的全部，他们必须每天支付费用。，这将归创作者所有。好吧，我相信互联网上有很多平台都有区块链内容，通过我们在Catalyst的努力，越来越多关于Cardano的内容会被创造和传播。这些是免费的和容易获得的内容，以不同的语言（例如，我们如何寻求为这个挑战提供资金，以及在关注不同地区的挑战，如非洲、日本和拉丁美洲）。如果有这么多免费的替代品，为什么一个人要为这种学徒支付费用？我不认为鼓励新人进入Cardano生态系统的最好方法是让他们为之支付一笔钱，无论多么小。在我看来，为他们提供免费的教育和培训，让他们采用我们的区块链和我们的货币，获得NFT、智能合约和Cardano中的各种技术，是比较合适的。后来，对于已经是我们网络用户的人，可以推广一系列的付费行动，但我认为，在Cardano的这个关口，还不是时候。我想知道的另一点是翻译的问题。社区将制作这些翻译的音频，它们将如何与图像同步，谁来编辑？这些翻译会不会被付费？因为在我看来，向观看视频的人收费，让他们把钱转给内容创作者，这似乎不太符合逻辑，而且也没有给翻译者的部分。不幸的是，我发现这个想法有几个缺点，我不认为它会对Cardano生态系统产生直接和可观的影响。
f6_assessments.q1: 这个团队相当完整，而且看起来非常合格；每个成员的名字、职能和Linkedin都提供了。然而，我错过了营销和设计人员参与这个项目，这对成功来说是极其重要的领域，因为这个平台需要高度宣传，并有一个符合人体工程学的友好界面来鼓励使用。在实施阶段提到了UI/UX设计，但谁会负责这个工作？该团队提出了一个脚本，但极其简短，谈到了随着时间的推移会发生什么。例如，在前3个月，平台将用基本的工具（哪些工具）创建。实施阶段可以被划分为几个月，例如，在第1个月，这个和那个活动将被完成，以此类推，以便对整个过程形成一个更坚实的感觉。我认为缺少很多细节，我无法理解这个平台将如何创建，实施阶段本身是以一种非常技术性的方式写的，所以该领域以外的人并不像开发人员那样理解将做什么。最后，财务部门也缺乏细节，我相信是实施阶段中提到的事情旁边的数字，但我希望作者能分出一个话题来谈钱，并解释为什么这笔钱会被用来做什么，并对每个小部分给出更多细节。例如，据我所知，2000美元将用于UI/UX设计，但这是什么样子的？负责的人（设计师）每小时的价格是多少，你会在多长时间内开发这个项目？总的来说，这个话题中唯一让我觉得完全安全的部分是团队介绍，否则我希望有更多的细节。
f6_assessments.q2: 作者为我们提供了一些KPI指标，这些指标可以作为监测项目的指南，基本上是这个平台的受众范围，以及这是否带来了新的参与者（讲不同语言的人）进入Cardano社区的后果。他们还承诺公布这些关键绩效指标的结果报告，这是相当积极的，基本上所有的投标人都提供关键绩效指标（当他们这样做的时候！），但让社区来监督他们或不监督。我不明白的是，这些报告将在哪里公布，我还认为这里有一个错字，因为他们说，直到前六个月，他们将每月公布结果，在此之后，每月...？总之，我希望他们澄清他们将在哪里向我们展示这些数据，并澄清多久做一次的问题。但除此之外，他们能主动更新社区，而不是产生需要我们中的一个人负责的情况，这很好。

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal identifies the problem of the need for Cardano's contents to be available in several languages. As a solution, it presents the construction of a platform where other users can dub the audio stream in their native language. This is a great idea to facilitate non-English speakers' access to information about Cardano and is in line with the challenge of attracting more non-English speakers to the Cardano ecosystem. The proposer does not present a plan to remain financially sustainable after funding from Catalyst.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer identifies and provides evidence of the experience of the team members. The budget is detailed and seems a little overpriced. A realistic timeframe for completing the proposed work is established. The proposal presents a roadmap that is good for evaluating the progress of the work, but I think it could be better detailed. The proposer did not consider any relevant risk for implementing the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The target problem and its solution were clearly presented. The proposal contains a roadmap with milestones that is important to assess the progress of the work. But I leave a note that I think the roadmap could be more detailed. The KPIs that are important for evaluating the success of the proposal were also provided.

f6_assessments.q0: This seems to be the platform every non english speaker developer would love to visit. Instead of wasting time translating the tutorial, the subtitles or the dub will guide the developer right into the technical issues he/she is trying to solve. I like the fact an incentive in ADA is given to the creators.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is well referenced and experienced, and the plan takes in account review steps and a proof of concept stage
f6_assessments.q2: The time line is effectively outlined, as well as the budget breakdown. Although the total requirement is about 50% of the total budget allocation for this challenge, this platform alone could solve effectively the challenge.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is well structured and has lots of good facts in it but they should state how they are going to get people onto this platform, because there is no mention of marketing. Their budget is also quite pricey for the type of task that they are doing.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer/s have good experience in this area, they also have a roadmap but its very short and simple with not much detail given. It doesn't say in the proposal how they will get people watch and listen to their audios and videos.
f6_assessments.q2: It will be quick to audit because there is a roadmap and timeline. It's also a simple plan so it will be easy to check on success. Something that this proposal is missing is a more detailed roadmap.

f6_assessments.q0: It seems that your project will help to reach the goal wanted by the challenge. In addition, in order to promote it, you should work on how you will market your project (advertisement, on which plateform, the budget allocated etc…). In order to be sure that your platform will touch a maximum of cardano user in every language, you should also prepare your plateform in many language (you should had a phase of translation in the phase of implementation)
f6_assessments.q1:
The project seems well prepare. In my point of view, you need to describe more what your team is composed of and also in what phases of implementation they will work.
 In order for your plateform to be multilanguage you should have to your team translators. 
In addition I think you have to precise what form will take your project: is it an app?, available on which platform ? You need to describe more where you will use your software
Finally I think you have to prepare how you will operate the plateform after the release (budget, final team etc…)
f6_assessments.q2: I only think that you need to clarify more how you will manage the members and advisors of your platform in order to be sure that the comments are impartial. You should think of a KPI measuring this

f6_assessments.q0:
As my reading, the proposal's target is a platform in which the community is the key to: decide videos content, create videos, dub the  videos, vote on videos quality,etc. In my opinion, the proposal is not impactful because it is not clear about the following points:
1. What makes community to be attracted to engage in the platform? (I suppose that they come to the platform somehow).
2. What makes community to create Cardano videos instead of another content?
3. What makes people from many regions come to dub videos so that the videos content becomes multilingual as the proposal's title?
…
I assess the proposal does not address the objectives laid out in the challenge completely.
f6_assessments.q1:
I strongly disagree the proposal is feasible because it is not clear about the following points:
-How could the proposers attract people from the community join the platform and create videos turorial 'like a contest'? (No cost for this creation in budget broken down)
- How could the proposers attract people from the community join the platform and translate the soundtrack of the videos into their native languages? 
Too much risk for building the content of the platform, I assume.
-Budget $53000 is more than 50% of total budget of the challenge, for building a platform (in which the content may not be created by the community based on the unclear plan) in 12 months. That is not reasonable.
f6_assessments.q2: The solution of the plan (about creating the content of the platform) is not clear as I mentioned above. Moreover, roadmap with milestones and items in budget broken down list are for building the platform only, while KPIs are for auditing the content of the platform. Therefore, I strongly disagree the proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: In terms of ideas, this is a useful proposition. Currently, there are many platforms that provide educational videos, but most of them are in English, and the video quality is not perfect. This recommendation build a platform, where cardano use case videos can be uploaded. And other users can dub the audio stream in their native language online.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team consists of many members, they have full knowledge and skills, have certain successes, this will be a solid basis to make the project implementation easier.
However, the roadmap and plans provided are too sketchy. There should be more criteria to choose a video/background music, for example: specifying video length,... Visitors want full content, need to pay a fee, specifically how much ? If necessary, I think the full content should be provided for free, because the vast majority of people tend to ignore the paid content.
It is also necessary to clarify the budget allocation (determine the number of hours worked, the amount per hour,...) It is also essential to provide a way to attract people to the platform (marketing, communication, etc.) , social network,...)
f6_assessments.q2:
The content provided is not really complete, there is no basis to evaluate the success of the project. The exporter needs to provide more detailed information about the specific long-term roadmap/marketing/budget allocation/... (as I mentioned in the previous section). In addition, the success criteria should also be described (eg: number of hits, number of downloads, number of positive comments,...), clearly defining difficulties- challenges encountered and how to deal with them are also essential.
This is a very good proposal, the team needs to work together, edit and add to this proposal, don't give up.

solution: 建立一个平台，可以上传Cardano用例视频。而其他用户可以在网上用他们的母语为音频流配音。
experience:
Mehmood开始接触Cardano。
Waheed Fullstack Developer 10年以上的经验。
拥有Didatic知识的Francis电影制作人
Gnana 商业分析师
Raja PM
